import React from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Navbar(props) { const history = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); history("/"); } let location = useLocation(); return ( <>
{props.title}
  • Home
  • Write
  • About
  • Profile
{!localStorage.getItem('token') ?
Login Signup
: Logout}
) }
